name: Citoyens pour le Climat
goal: Citoyens Pour Le Climat is a French non-for profit organization focused on global warming and biodiversity preservation. We aim at disseminating knowledge on global warming and at promoting actions to tackle it, at an individual and collective level. We coordinate actions of more than 150 local groups from across France that organize regular climate marchs and strikes, as well as local lobbying. We develop material for knowledge dissemination on IPCC reports, greenhouse gas emissions, carbon footprint. We act towards all stakeholders, in order to promote decisions compatible with a 1.5Â°C pathway.
